column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When it comes to food adventures
column2: I love to be accompanied by those whom are openly affectionate. By that
column3: I'm referencing to cartwheels and giggles that extend from the lungs to as far down as one's tippy toes. Needless to say
column4: a half pitcher of white peach sangria added to that effect. #lightweight
